name: ALTUVIIIO

indications.text: altuviiio [ antihemophilic factor ( recombinant ) , fc-vwf-xten fusion protein-ehtl ] von willebrand factor ( vwf ) independent recombinant dna-derived , factor viii concentrate indicated adults children hemophilia ( congenital factor viii deficiency ) : routine prophylaxis reduce frequency bleeding episodes on-demand treatment control bleeding episodes perioperative management bleeding

adverseReactions: altuviiio contraindicated patients severe hypersensitivity , including anaphylaxis , product excipients [ description ( 11 ) ] .
indications_original:
ALTUVIIIO [antihemophilic factor (recombinant), Fc-VWF-XTEN fusion protein-ehtl] is a von Willebrand Factor (VWF) independent recombinant DNA-derived, Factor VIII concentrate indicated for use in adults and children with hemophilia A (congenital factor VIII deficiency) for:
                  
                     Routine prophylaxis to reduce the frequency of bleeding episodes
                     On-demand treatment and control of bleeding episodes
                     Perioperative management of bleeding
contraindications_original: For intravenous use after reconstitution only.
adverseReactions_original: ALTUVIIIO is contraindicated in patients who have had severe hypersensitivity reactions, including anaphylaxis, to the product or its excipients [see Description (11)].
